name: Hexa Farm :Simple Block Puzzle
description:
Hexa Farm:Simple Block Puzzle is a very fun and exciting hexa block match puzzle game that challenges your brain
In this new puzzle game you need to fill Hexa fields with multi-colored blocks. Drag the Blocks onto the field, get stars and crowns, open new packs.
A soft balance of the levels will not let your brain relax and various options of complexity will allow small children to easily understand this fascinating game.
The KING of BRAIN TEASERS!
Do you enjoy the puzzle games? Do you like lovely colors?
Here comes the perfect game for you, Hexa Farm:Simple Block Puzzle!
FEATURES
• BLOCK MATCH PUZZLE
- Ideal for all ages
- Play easily and quickly.
• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay
• NO TIME LIMIT
- Enjoy game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- You can play offline in anytime.
• INSTANT SAVE!
- Always save the game when you quit or turn off your phone.
• STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Soothing sounds and gorgeous visual effects.
WHY NOT CHOOSE THIS BLOCK HEXA?
Use hints if you are having trouble at some levels. Hints are updated with daily entry into the game and they are also in gifts after passing certain levels, but try to solve puzzles on your own, because it makes an additional challenge to your brain! ;)
